roleset.name: to make fresh or new again
roleset.note: REJUVENATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rejuvenate' based on dictionary.com; nominal 'rejuvenation' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1. (from rejuvenate.01-v)
REJUVENATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from rejuvenation.01-n)

example.name: nominal rel: rejuvenation
example.text: While at one time China had the two powerful engines of economy and politics , the inevitable result must be for China to realize its great rejuvenation .
